nodes.text: Jerus Jannick was one of the many Naboo officers during the invasion by the Trade Federation. As a lieutenant of the Royal Naboo Security Forces, he helped assist Queen Padmé Amidala in capturing Neimoidian Viceroy Nute Gunray during the Battle of Naboo. Jannick was trained specifically to protect monarchy members.
Jerus Jannick was played by actor Dominic West.
